translations: 货币主义的，关于货币控制政策的

sentences.sentence: This is a contemporary version of the old Keynesian versus monetarist dispute.
sentences.translation: 这是现代版的凯恩斯主义者与货币主义者之争。

sentences.sentence: This impoverishing definition is even easier to discredit than the monetarist description.
sentences.translation: 这样贫乏的定义甚至比货币主义者们的描述更值得怀疑。

sentences.sentence: In the monetarist model that he practiced, money growth beyond a pre-set point was inflation.
sentences.translation: 在他擅长的货币主义模型中，货币增长超过一个预设点就是通胀。
